Control Name: IDENTIFICATION AND AUTHENTICATION | LOCAL ACCESS TO PRIVILEGED ACCOUNTS
Control Statement: The information system implements multifactor authentication for local access to privileged accounts.Supplemental Guidance:  Related control: AC-6.
